channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
Hello guys, I am having trouble with my web-client; I have it online and everybody can got on except for me.
It is online, hosting off my computer, players are able to get on and off except for me.
If anybody knows a good fix to this I would appreciate it. Thanks.

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

In your client, use 127.0.0.1 instead of your No-IP address.

Read full topic
